name: AnExaminationOfBoundaryRecognitionInUnsupervisedVideoSegmentation
postAttachCommand: /usr/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install pip setuptools wheel -U && cd /workspaces/AnExaminationOfBoundaryRecognitionInUnsupervisedVideoSegmentation && pip install -r ./code/requirements.txt && python ./code/init.py && python -m spacy download en_core_web_trf && cd ./code/model && wget https://storage.googleapis.com/bert_models/2020_02_20/uncased_L-12_H-768_A-12.zip && unzip uncased_L-12_H-768_A-12.zip
